CodeList.Name: Treatment Satisfaction Questionnaire for Medication Version 1.4 Questionnaire Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: Treatment Satisfaction Questionnaire for Medication Version 1.4 test code.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Treatment Satisfaction Questionnaire for Medication - How satisfied or dissatisfied are you with the ability of the medication to prevent or treat your condition?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: TSQM Version 1.4 - Medication to Prevent or Treat Condition

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Treatment Satisfaction Questionnaire for Medication - How satisfied or dissatisfied are you with the way the medication relieves your symptoms?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: TSQM Version 1.4 - Way Medication Relieves Symptoms

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: TSQM01-Time Takes Med to Start Working
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Treatment Satisfaction Questionnaire for Medication - How satisfied or dissatisfied are you with the amount of time it takes the medication to start working?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: TSQM Version 1.4 - Time Takes Medication to Start Working

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: TSQM01-Experience Any Side Effect at All
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Treatment Satisfaction Questionnaire for Medication - As a result of taking this medication, do you experience any side effects at all?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: TSQM Version 1.4 - Experience Any Side Effect at All

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Treatment Satisfaction Questionnaire for Medication - How bothersome are the side effects of the medication you take to treat your condition?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: TSQM Version 1.4 - How Bothersome Are Side Effects

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Treatment Satisfaction Questionnaire for Medication - To what extent do the side effects interfere with your physical health and ability to function (i.e., strength, energy levels, etc.)?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: TSQM Version 1.4 - Interfere With Physical Health

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Treatment Satisfaction Questionnaire for Medication - To what extent do the side effects interfere with your mental function (i.e., ability to think clearly, stay awake, etc.)?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: TSQM Version 1.4 - Interfere With Mental Function

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Treatment Satisfaction Questionnaire for Medication - To what degree have medication side effects affected your overall satisfaction with the medication?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: TSQM Version 1.4 - Side Effect Affect Overall Satisfaction

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Treatment Satisfaction Questionnaire for Medication - How easy or difficult is it to use the medication in its current form?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: TSQM Version 1.4 - Easy or Difficult Use Medication

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: TSQM01-Easy/Difficult to Plan Use of Med
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Treatment Satisfaction Questionnaire for Medication - How easy or difficult is it to plan when you will use the medication each time?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: TSQM Version 1.4 - Easy or Difficult to Plan Use of Medication

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Treatment Satisfaction Questionnaire for Medication - How convenient or inconvenient is it to take the medication as instructed?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: TSQM Version 1.4 - Convenient or Inconvenient Take Medication

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: TSQM01-Confident Med Is Good for You
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Treatment Satisfaction Questionnaire for Medication - Overall, how confident are you that taking this medication is a good thing for you?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: TSQM Version 1.4 - Confident Medication Is Good for You

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Treatment Satisfaction Questionnaire for Medication - How certain are you that the good things about your medication outweigh the bad things?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: TSQM Version 1.4 - Certain Good Things Outweigh Bad

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Treatment Satisfaction Questionnaire for Medication - Taking all things into account, how satisfied or dissatisfied are you with this medication?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: TSQM Version 1.4 - Satisfied or Dissatisfied With Medication

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Treatment Satisfaction Questionnaire for Medication Version 1.4 Questionnaire Test Code
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire TSQM Version 1.4 Test Code Terminology
